alert.note: Alert for Grant; Hidalgo (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 7:17PM MDT until August 03 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: The National Weather Service in El Paso has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Grant County in southwestern New Mexico... Central Hidalgo County in southwestern New Mexico... * Until 800 PM MDT. * At 716 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles southwest of Separ, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Grant and central Hidalgo Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
